connector.description: Receive event data from Google Calendar.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.ind.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.index
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.ind.description: An index for the Google Calendar endpoint.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.cal.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.calendarId
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.cal.description: The calendar ID to use as the source of event data.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.cli.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.clientId
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.cli.description: The Client ID of the Google Calendar application.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.cli.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.clientSecret
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.cli.description: The Client secret of the Google Calendar application.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.acc.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.accessToken
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.acc.description: The OAuth 2 access token for the Google Calendar application. This token typically expires after an hour. For long term usage, set the `refreshToken` property.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.ref.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.refreshToken
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.ref.description: The OAuth 2 refresh token for the Google Calendar application. The Google Calendar component can obtain a new `accessToken` whenever the current one expires. Set this value for long term usage.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.del.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.delay
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.del.description: The number of milliseconds before the next poll.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.syn.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.syncFlow
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.syn.description: Specifies to sync events for incremental synchronization.

camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.con.name: camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.consumeFromNow
camel.kamelet.google-calendar-source.con.description: Specfies to consume events in the calendar from now on.
